name: sharptools-scripts
description: Project root scripts for documentation and tooling

scripts.prechat: sh -c 'PORT=${PORT:-8787}; PIDS=$(lsof -ti tcp:$PORT); if [ -n "$PIDS" ]; then echo "Killing process(es) on port $PORT: $PIDS"; kill $PIDS || true; sleep 0.5; PIDS=$(lsof -ti tcp:$PORT); if [ -n "$PIDS" ]; then echo "Force killing: $PIDS"; kill -9 $PIDS || true; fi; fi'
